sys_script_include.description: Include Script to create a JavaScript object from an XML document.
sys_script_include.name: ToObjectFromXml

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_140b8e371b8600104794fc86cc4bcbf0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.ToObjectFromXml</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Include Script to create a JavaScript object from an XML document.</description><name>ToObjectFromXml</name><script><![CDATA[var ToObjectFromXml = Class.create();
ToObjectFromXml.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
	var xmlString ="<company>"+"<employee>"+"<id>10</id>"
	+"<firstname>Tom</firstname>"+"<lastname>Cruise</lastname>"
	+"<test>test1</test>"+"<test>test3</test>"+"</employee>"
	+"<employee>"+"<id>20</id>"+"<firstname>Paul</firstname>"
	+"<lastname>Enderson</lastname>"+"<test>test6</test>"
	+"<test>test5</test>"+"</employee>"+"<employee>"+"<id>30</id>"
	+"<firstname>Paul</firstname>"+"<lastname>Bush</lastname>"  
	+"<test>test2</test>"+"<test>test4</test>"+"</employee>"+"</company>"; 
 
	var helper =new XMLHelper(xmlString);
	var obj = helper.toObject();
	
	logObj(obj,"*");
	function logObj(obj, sep){
		for(x in obj){
		if(typeof obj[x]!="function"){
			gs.log(sep + x +":: "+ obj[x]);}
		logObj(obj[x], sep +"*");}}
	},

    type: 'ToObjectFromXml'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-06 22:52:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>140b8e371b8600104794fc86cc4bcbf0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ToObjectFromXml</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_140b8e371b8600104794fc86cc4bcbf0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-06 22:54:56</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
